Class PlanetSystemAPI

java.lang.Object
controllers.PlanetSystemAPI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISerializer
public class PlanetSystemAPI extends Object implements ISerializer

    • fileName

      public String fileName()
      Specified by:
      fileName in interface ISerializer

    • addPlanetObject

      public boolean addPlanetObject(Planet planet)
      Add the planet object, passed as a parameter, to the ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      planet - Planet object to be added to the ArrayList.

    • deletePlanetByIndex

      public Planet deletePlanetByIndex(int indexToDelete)
      Delete a Planet from the ArrayList, if it exists, at the index passed as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      indexToDelete - Index of the Planet object in the ArrayList
      Returns:
      The deleted planet object or null if no object is at the index location

    • deleteAllPlanets

      public boolean deleteAllPlanets()
      Delete a Planet from the ArrayList, if it exists, at the index passed as a parameter.
      Returns:
      true if The planet object has been cleared or false if it is not cleared

    • deletePlanetById

      public Planet deletePlanetById(int idToDelete)
      Delete a Planet from the ArrayList, if it exists, at the ID passed as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      idToDelete - ID of the Planet object in the ArrayList
      Returns:
      The deleted planet object or null if no object is at the id location

    • getPlanetByIndex

      public Planet getPlanetByIndex(int index)
      get a planet object at a specific index location. If the index location is not valid, return null.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the Planet object in the ArrayList
      Returns:
      The planet object or null if no object is at the index location

    • getPlanetById

      public Planet getPlanetById(int id)
      get a planet object at a specific ID location. If the ID location is not valid, return null.
      Parameters:
      id - of the Planet object in the ArrayList
      Returns:
      The planet object or null if no object is at the ID location

    • getPlanetsByType

      public List<Planet> getPlanetsByType(String planetType)
      get a list of planet objects by Type If the list is empty, return null.
      Parameters:
      planetType - of the Planet object in the ArrayList
      Returns:
      a list of planet objects By the type passed as parameter or null if the list is empty

    • listAllPlanets

      public String listAllPlanets()
      This method builds and returns a String containing all the planets in the ArrayList. For each planet stored, the associated index number is included. If no planets are stored in the ArrayList, the String "No planets" is returned.
      Returns:
      A String containing all the planets in the ArrayList, or "No planets", if empty.

    • listAllGasPlanets

      public String listAllGasPlanets()
      This method builds and returns a String containing all the Gas planets in the ArrayList. For each planet stored, the associated index number is included. If no planets are stored in the ArrayList, the String "No Gas planets" is returned.
      Returns:
      A String containing all the Gas planets in the ArrayList, or "No Gas planets", if empty.

    • listAllIcePlanets

      public String listAllIcePlanets()
      This method builds and returns a String containing all the Ice planets in the ArrayList. For each planet stored, the associated index number is included. If no planets are stored in the ArrayList, the String "No Ice planets" is returned.
      Returns:
      A String containing all the Gas planets in the ArrayList, or "No Ice planets", if empty.

    • listAllPlanetObjectsHeavierThan

      public String listAllPlanetObjectsHeavierThan(double massThreshold)
      This method builds and returns a String containing all the planets heavier than the parameter passed. For each planet stored, the associated index number is included. If no planets are stored in the ArrayList, the String "No planets heavier than the parameter " is returned.
      Parameters:
      massThreshold - The mass threshold to be used to filter the planets.
      Returns:
      A String containing all the planets in the ArrayList which is heavier than the parameter, or "No Ice planets", if empty.

    • listAllPlanetObjectsSmallerThan

      public String listAllPlanetObjectsSmallerThan(double diameterThreshold)
      This method builds and returns a String containing all the planets are smaller than the parameter passed. For each planet stored, the associated index number is included. If no planets are stored in the ArrayList, the String "No planets smaller than the parameter " is returned.
      Parameters:
      diameterThreshold - The diameter threshold to be used to filter the planets.
      Returns:
      A String containing all the planets in the ArrayList which is heavier than the parameter, or "No Ice planets", if empty.

    • numberOfPlanets

      public int numberOfPlanets()
      Returns number of planets

    • numberOfGasPlanets

      public int numberOfGasPlanets()
      Returns number of gas planets

    • numberOfIcePlanets

      public int numberOfIcePlanets()
      Returns number of ice planets

    • getPlanets

      public List<Planet> getPlanets()
      This method returns the planets ArrayList
      Returns:
      the planets ArrayList

    • setPlanets

      public void setPlanets(ArrayList<Planet> planets)
      This method takes in an ArrayList of planets objects and sets the planets ArrayList to it.
      Parameters:
      planets - An ArrayList of product objects.

    • updateIcePlanet

      public boolean updateIcePlanet(int idToUpdate, IcePlanet updateDetails)
      Update an Ice Planet in the ArrayList with the contents passed in the Planet object parameter.
      Parameters:
      idToUpdate - Index of the Ice Planet object in the ArrayList
      updateDetails - An Ice Planet object containing the updated details
      Returns:
      The status of the update, True or False

    • updateGasPlanet

      public boolean updateGasPlanet(int idToUpdate, GasPlanet updateDetails)
      Update a Gas Planet in the ArrayList with the contents passed in the Planet object parameter.
      Parameters:
      idToUpdate - Index of the Gas Planet object in the ArrayList
      updateDetails - A Gas Planet object containing the updated details
      Returns:
      The status of the update, True or False

    • searchByPlanetName

      public String searchByPlanetName(String planetName)
      This method returns a string containing all planets whose planet name starts with (regardless of case) the search string. The index location of the planet in the arraylist is also returned.
      Parameters:
      planetName - The string to search by
      Returns:
      products whose product name contains the search string

    • sortByDiameterDescending

      public void sortByDiameterDescending()

    • sortByDiameterAscending

      public void sortByDiameterAscending()

    • sortByRadiationDescending

      public List<Planet> sortByRadiationDescending()
      Selection sort algorithm for sorting the arraylist of planets by radiation Descending.
      Returns:
      a list of Gas Planets sorted by Radiation level or null if a list is empty

    • sortByGravityDescending

      public List<Planet> sortByGravityDescending()
      Selection sort algorithm for sorting the arraylist of planets by gravity Descending.
      Returns:
      a list of Planets sorted by gravity or null if a list is empty

    • topFiveHighestRadiationGasPlanet

      public List<Planet> topFiveHighestRadiationGasPlanet()

    • topFiveBiggestPlanet

      public List<Planet> topFiveBiggestPlanet()

    • load

      public void load() throws Exception
      The load method uses the XStream component to read all the models objects from the planets.xml file stored on the hard disk. The read objects are loaded into the posts ArrayList
      Specified by:
      load in interface ISerializer
      Throws:
      Exception - An exception is thrown if an error occurred during the load e.g. a missing file.

    • save

      public void save() throws Exception
      The save method uses the XStream component to write all the objects in the posts ArrayList to the planets.xml file stored on the hard disk.
      Specified by:
      save in interface ISerializer
      Throws:
      Exception - An exception is thrown if an error occurred during the save e.g. drive is full.

    • findIndexById

      public int findIndexById(int id)
      Find the Index by the Planet Id passed as a parameter
      Parameters:
      id - of planet object
      Returns:
      The index of Planet object in the list

    • findIcePlanet

      public IcePlanet findIcePlanet(int id)
      Find an Ice Planet object at a specific index location. If the index location is not valid, return null.
      Parameters:
      id - of the Ice Planet object in the ArrayList
      Returns:
      The Ice Planet object or null if no object is at the index location

    • findGasPlanet

      public GasPlanet findGasPlanet(int id)
      Find a Gas Planet object at a specific index location. If the index location is not valid, return null.
      Parameters:
      id - of the Gas Planet object in the ArrayList
      Returns:
      The Gas Planet object or null if no object is at the index location

    • highestPlanetId

      public int highestPlanetId()
      This method returns the highest number of Planet ID in the ArrayList. If no planets are stored in the ArrayList, 1000 is returned.
      Returns:
      The highest Planet ID in the ArrayList or 1000, if no planets are added yet.

    • isValidId

      public boolean isValidId(int id)
